“<HER>Mr. Wang Guangya (China)</HER> (spoke in Chinese):

“<HER>Mr. Beyani</HER>: I would like to thank the Permanent Mission of <HER>Argentina</HER> and the other members of the <HER>Security Council</HER> for holding this open debate on the critical issue of <VIC>displaced women and girls</VIC> in the framework of the <HER>women and peace and security</HER> agenda. During situations of conflict and violence, <HER_VIC>women and girls</HER_VIC> flee to escape arbitrary killings, rape, torture, inhumane or degrading treatment or starvation.
